About Lavash Cafe

Get to Know Lavash: A Culinary Journey Across Borders

Lavash is more than a cafe; it’s a journey of culinary discovery. From sunrise to sunset, we offer a mesmerizing blend of international flavors, beautifully crafted and inspired by the world’s most cherished cuisines. 

As artisan bread makers, our homemade sourdough, milk bread, and brioche set the foundation for an immersive dining experience. 

Dive into our exotic burger offerings, relish our all-day breakfast options, and wind down with our specialty coffees and desserts. Each dish tells a story, each taste is an experience – Welcome to Lavash!

Order Now

Exotic Meat Burgers

Venture into the untamed with our selection of exotic meat burgers. Sink your teeth into the luxurious Camel Truffle Burger, or enjoy the tender nuances of our Deer Meat Sliders. Our Duck Meat burgers and Mutton Kebab Burgers tantalize the adventurous, while our original burger creations ensure a unique, unforgettable flavor experience.

Discover more
What we Indulge in

Exotic burgers

Bite into Boldness - Our Exotic Burgers Thrill the Senses
Experience a fresh take on burgers with our exotic meat selections. Each is an innovative culinary masterpiece, created using the finest ingredients and served with our artisan breads.
Learn More

All day breakfast

Morning Flavors, All Day Long - International Breakfast Selections at Your Service

Immerse yourself in the tastes of the world as you savor our breakfast selections all day. From English and American classics to Mediterranean, Lebanese, and Turkish inspirations, each dish is an adventure.
Learn More

Artisan dessert

Delight in Sweetness - Our Artisan Desserts Spell Indulgence

Our handcrafted desserts are the perfect finale to a meal, or a delightful indulgence on their own. Prepared with love, our sweet treats are sure to satisfy.
Learn More

Speacility coffee

Uplift Your Senses - Indulge in Our Specialty Coffees

Experience the world's finest coffees, expertly brewed to perfection. Our selection ranges from the robust to the smooth, each sip a testament to our commitment to quality.
Learn More

Get Together

Create Memories - Lavish Celebrations at Lavash
Our warm and inviting atmosphere sets the stage for lavish celebrations, whether it's a joyous family reunion, a milestone birthday, or a corporate gathering.
Learn More

House BBQ

Sizzling Delights - Revel in Our House BBQ Specials
Join us at Lavash for an unforgettable BBQ experience that will have you savoring every delicious moment.

Visit Lavash Dessert Cafe Today

Whether you’re celebrating a special occasion, catching up with friends, or simply treating yourself to a well-deserved moment of indulgence, Lavash Dessert Cafe is the ultimate destination for all your sweet desires. 

Join us at Lavash Dessert Cafe and experience a world of sugary delights that will awaken your senses and leave you craving for more. From the first sip to the last bite, prepare to be transported to a realm of sweetness and satisfaction. Your dessert adventure awaits at Lavash Dessert Cafe.

An invitation epilogue

Ready for a culinary voyage? Step into Lavash Cafe today and discover a world of taste. We can’t wait to serve you!

Testimonial

What they say about us

Very good dessert and burgers!! I Will definitely come back. The staff were very friendly and made the dinning super easing and comforting. Again, the dessert is AMAZING!! The date pudding cake is so delicious, so was the cheese cake.

Excellent hospitality and great plus a delicious deserts ,I recommend to try it all dishes are very delicious and wish the best for all the team
